website_summaries.verdict: If appearance is your top concern, this elegant model could be a good choice.
pros: A wine jail model that's both beautiful and secure
Spacious interior holds up to 45 bottles
Wrought iron looks great on display
cons: Ornate design may be impractical for some consumers
It's also a bit shorter than some owners anticipated

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love our wine jail! We looked at many options before purchasing this one. We also looked at the cheaper versions of the wine jail but they weighed about half as much. We want it to last. It arrives completely assembled and seems very substantial.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Form and Function plus a Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Arrives in one piece. True what other reviewer warns of: little styrofoam pieces will be sticking to it. I simply vacuumed them off w the hose attachment. Very sturdy-much more than I thought it would be. It is exactly as measured, and the design is lovely-looks nice, not cheap. It is brassier than bronze- I’ve attached a pic to show. I like it regardless. Fits reds, whites, and even champagne bottles we have (RSVP from TJs and a German variety), which no one mentioned but am happy to report (and use!). Very pleased with the purchase. What an attractive way to store wine.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What Was Needed
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking unit, comes fully assembled (in very large box), is extremely sturdy. Just got my third one as my wine storage needs grow. Apparently I acquire faster than I consume. Would highly recommend this to anyone with the need to store wine in a visible part of your house since it is very visually appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece.....well made....great price.....looks awesome...but, the metal loop that is welded to the frame for the door lock to slide through broke off in shipping. I thought of returning it, but after I filled the rack with wine, the weight of the unit keeps the door closed without it being locked. This is the only design flaw on an otherwise beautiful piece, albeit a sizable one.
customer_reviews.author: James Frawley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wine rack that would hold about 36 bottles, that looked interesting and not cheap! This was gorgeous in every way! Wine rack came in one piece nothing to put together, like those other cheap ones. Sturdy and nice brassy/black color. I want to get the jail pad lock to complete the look! Well worth the money. You won't regret it! MADE IN THE USA!
customer_reviews.author: Huskymomma

customer_reviews.title: Well made.  Very happy.  Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it. Beautiful wine jail. Better than I expexted. Love the color, good welds, packed well. Thankfully no damages from shipping. I get comments all the time. So glad I got this one. Wish it could hold my larger bottles, but, thats ok. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Rehm

customer_reviews.title: Great storage area for wines
customer_reviews.text: It's very eye appealing. It's sturdy. It does not wobble or lean. It can hold small to large bottles of wine. It can not hold a magma size. We have received many compliments on the piece. Know one has seen this in local department or wine stores. Yes, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia C.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for speedy shipment
customer_reviews.text: Great seller, the wine jail was shipped out the same day as the order, I was pleasantly surprised as it arrived way ahead of schedule. Now I see why seller has 5 star of this product. It is very nice,already assembled out of box, & quite sturdy, just look out for the styrofoam beads from the packaging lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty AND Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Listen.... Let's be real here... It is constructed well. It is pretty and impressive. With regards to the lock and latch..... Folks it's for looks. Can you still get in with it locked, Yea. But if I need to lock up my beverage and keep hands away from it I would have bought a safe, or put a lock on my kitchen cabinet, or left it in the bushes in the back yard. I'm from Cleveland so its like an ice box out there half the time anyway. It is what it is.... A nice sturdy and ornamental display. Happy Goucho !
customer_reviews.author: Terry K. Giancaterino

customer_reviews.title: Great wine storage
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t expecting it to be here this quick or be in this good shape. (Sometimes large items I’ve ordered get damaged in shipping but this was packed to ensure no damage to the item) fully assembled and good quality. If you’re running out of room for your wine and need storage that looks great I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: BarneyFiend

customer_reviews.title: Asthetically Pleasing and Functional for the Home or Apartment
customer_reviews.text: This wrought iron wine rack is asthetically pleasing as it is functional. If I had one quib with the purchase is that since this a locking wine rack, the manufacturer or sellet could have included a functional lock. Otherwise, I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: RVN

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive looking and sturdy. Very happy with it. I would have liked some bigger cubbys for Champagne bottles and wines with bigger diameters.
customer_reviews.author: Sive

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wine holder
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something affordable to hold our wine that we have been collecting over the years. We have bought some smaller ones but needed something bigger since our collection has grown. This Wine Jail fit the bill nicely and looks great in our basement and is the type that will fit in with many different style rooms. It is very sturdy and has a door that closes around the wine. Excellent purchase- we may get another one as out collection grows ever more!!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Solid, great quality, and VALUE for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece! Very sturdy even on carpet, love that it came assembled. The ability to lock will be very useful in a house with teenage boys!! Definitely recommend... it is all that everyone else says, and more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this wine rack. We got a lot of complements when we had a wine night with friends. It is very classy looking and I love the fact that the bottles are protected by a door when the grandkids are over. Arrived on time and was assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Kris W

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very attractive. Some of our fat bottles fit a little snug in the circles, and 1.5liters will not fit. It's hard to tell from the pictures, but the one I received is gold colored.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack is very stable, and well made. In addition, it fits in a very small space, and is quite attractive. Good value for money!
customer_reviews.author: DVD

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Prebuilt
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Sturdy and attractive, plus comes totally built! Really impressed with the quality of the “Wine Jail”
customer_reviews.author: A. Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, functional, and decorative.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, great looking wine jail. I bought another one! Fits Burgundy and Bordeaux style bottles with no problem. Bottles lay at a slight decline to keep corks moist. Great value. Looks like it should cost $250.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great wine rack
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack not only looks great but displays the wine bottles with style.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bodie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and holds many bottles of wine. Great looking peice that fits with many different styles
customer_reviews.author: Conner

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Only wish they made a larger size!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this! In my mind I saw it as larger but that is no fault of manufacturer. I do wish they made this in a larger size but I’m happy with the value, sturdiness and look!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Quintas

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great piece fits within my design the bottles look great and I love the design of the iron wrought wine jaill. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Santos Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Well-made wine jail
customer_reviews.text: I set this wine jail In my dining room next to our hutch. If you have limited space, this item fits the bill. It feels very sturdy and well made. A breeze to assemble. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really love this to death!
customer_reviews.text: I love it , might have to purchase another one for my wine collection. I also bought the lock and key set. Very classy and it really decorates the room.
customer_reviews.author: unoduney

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: I love this wine rack! By itself it is a bit wobbly, but once you put some wine bottles in it, it is pretty steady.
customer_reviews.author: Julie W

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It was a little smaller than I expected, but it turned out to be the perfect size for the space. Well built, very attractive, I love that I can easily store and access my wine and other spirits, then lock them up! I added my own combination lock to keep things secure. Very happy with this product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Impressive and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and fully assembled. All I had to do was put it in place and load the wine.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: It's great that the wine jail comes fully assembled -- but as other reviews have said, open outside to avoid styrofoam getting in the house! I was looking for wine storage that would fit in a narrow space, and this one works great. It's also very attractive and holds a ton of wine. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Winger

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Great look and quality. I have purchased 3 of these. They were perfect each and every time. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love this wine holder
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. Matches our furniture and it's well made. We love it. Stores lots of wine and very attractive to look at too!
customer_reviews.author: MandM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect center piece
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack looks great in my living room, it is well built and holds enough wine to keep company well invited! Would recommend this for others!
customer_reviews.author: Cwr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, we bought 2 and put them touching. Loos fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: fussy buyer

customer_reviews.title: We liked this so much
customer_reviews.text: We liked this so much, this is the second one we bought. I make my own wine and this rack is the coolest way to store and show the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great design
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, holds every shape of bottle pretty well. Style is nice, wish there was a taller one me but I’ll be getting another one for sure
customer_reviews.author: Romina

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it. Very well built and looks great. Bought her an antique iron padlock to secure it, goes perfect.
customer_reviews.author: j. a. g.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful, comes completely assembled! Sturdy, great quality, so happy we purchased this! Great accent piece!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This gift was the highlight of my Father-in-law's Christmas. Sturdy construction with a beautiful finish. My only regret is that I didnt buy it for him severam years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Michael's Godfather

customer_reviews.title: Win Jail
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Is quite sturdy even when filled it does not seem unstable. If I need another I would defiantly order this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Suz A.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Old World Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a Christmas gift several years ago. It is extremely attractive and performs as desired. I bought one for my son and daughter in law this Christmas because I know that they will be delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: It's small
customer_reviews.text: It's Beautiful but small. Won't hold a standard bottle of champagne. It's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: King Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my wine jail
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my wine jail. It is perfect on my wall space. It looks great! I might get another one soon. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: kathy newell

customer_reviews.title: Not real sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The weld on One of the two panels came loose and the panel came detached in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Wine Jail Looks Great In our Barbecue Restuarant
customer_reviews.text: The wrought iron wine jail looks very rustic and fits great with the decor of our barbecue restuarant. We are able to secure and display our local wines from the Umpqua Valley. The price is great as well. I would recommend this purchase to anyone that is interested in purchasing this wine jail. I like the nifty key lock as well. It looks like something from an old trunk that you would find on a pirate ship.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine T. Lavington

customer_reviews.title: Wrought iron wine jail
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the product. No assembly required. Goes perfectly with our dining room furniture. We like the fact that it can be locked. ( lock not included ) Would highly recommend this product. Hope this was helpful. YD & RD S.C.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD DEGALL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! I did not like the color
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I did not like the color...not a antique gold person. I painted it flat black and it is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my wine jail. Works perfectly for what I wanted it for. Going to have SO much fun filling it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jenrae

customer_reviews.title: Great little wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Great little wine rack. Can’t hold large bottles but works great for the 48 it’s says it holds. Light weight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: james windover

customer_reviews.title: this is the best of this type of wine display that I found ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is the best of this type of wine display that I found online. I wanted a larger one, but most of the tall ones are between $400-$900. So this was the best option since I didn't want to spend that much at this time. And it really is quite pretty! Several people have come to my house and commented on how much they like the piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie

customer_reviews.title: Can still be opened with lock on.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that the latch piece isn’t long enough if you truly want to keep minors out of your wine. It can be bent on the side and then opened. Otherwise, it is beautiful and holds a lot of wine for being a relatively small cabinet. It looks nice in my formal dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Nice wine rack, fit my needs well. I did however use a can of black spray paint to enhance the color which was much more gold that expected. With the paint, the gold shows minimally and looks much better. The rack is sturdy and the height is perfect for my space.
customer_reviews.author: R Allen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the height...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to stand taller but the height does not reach the height of my light switches. It's a weird height that looks awkward against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: MMB

customer_reviews.title: I love my wine jail
customer_reviews.text: I love my wine jail. It come very fast and is even better looking than the picture. Everyone that comes to my house admires it and wants to know how I got it So happy Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: leonor 6538@ gmail . com

customer_reviews.title: Love it and unique rack.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived completely assembled. Out of box and ready to use. Holds 45 bottles. Bought an antique lock just to accent. Locking mechanism is pure decoration or very low level deterrent. Great quality and very nice conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: SteveinSC

customer_reviews.title: Great for wine storage.
customer_reviews.text: Product was just as advertised and well worth the money. I bought two and they look great in both corners of my dining room. Would be nice to have larger holes at the bottom for champagne.
customer_reviews.author: T. Barron

customer_reviews.title: A very pleased customer :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made and sturdy wine rack. The only downfall is that it doesn't allow you to put a large bottle of wine in it, but it is a beautiful piece of iron work
customer_reviews.author: William McBee

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item, sturdy, not as big as expected but looks classy and I’m super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Oquendo

customer_reviews.title: Wine Bottle Storage
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of furniture done in black iron that adds a conversation piece while displaying our assortment of wines.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful comes fully assembled. Will not fit champagne or sparking wine bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Sjeanes

customer_reviews.title: Incredible wine jail and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the 72 positive reviews and all I can say is wow. It looks great and matches all decor. The door opens left to right . It fits regular bottles and ones slightly larger. Just get it.
customer_reviews.author: dschott

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. We have a LARGE wine collection
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. We have a LARGE wine collection, and this was to be a great addition to our wine room. I love the look and idea of it, but the latch is too short and doesn't hold the door closed. I would have returned it, but my packaging was damaged. So now, I have this great idea of a wine rack with a door that continuously comes open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to my dinning room. Very sturdy and attractive. I had been looking for wine jail for year when I found this one.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: 45 bottle wine rack, good value
customer_reviews.text: It looked dark in the pics but has a lot more of a bronze look in person. Besides that it is very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love This Wine Jail!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this wine jail. This was the second unit we purchased.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We like the look of this wine jail. Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We are really pleased with this purchase. It's not as big as I'd like but it's really nicely made. The quality is good. I would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this wine jail! It looks great in my dining room and isn't over bearing.

customer_reviews.title: Great wine holder:)
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Looks great and has really pretty details. Very study and well built.

customer_reviews.title: Nice de orative wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Love this, just which they had a larger one. Beautiful style, exactly as described.

customer_reviews.title: easy to place bottles in and get them out
customer_reviews.text: Attractive finish and design, easy to place bottles in and get them out. Great experience with the seller; easy to work with and very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be sturdy and the metal looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It arrive with free shipping in just a few days. It was fully assembled in the box. Seems to be sturdy and the metal looks beautiful. It is more copper than black. Love the rustic look. The photos don't do it justice. Stunning! It was set up and full of wine in just minutes after it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful attractive and very functional piece. Holds wine bottles safely and securely. Very impressed with this product!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this wine jail!
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the other reviews, I don't have a bad thing to say about this rack. It comes fully assembled and looks fantastic! All my bottles fit perfectly and the size is just right!!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great looks . My wife saw the exact same item that was double the price of this.

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful as well as useful and it kept our wine ...
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than it looks, but holds all of our wine collection without taking up a lot of room. It is beautiful as well as useful and it kept our wine safe during the latest earthquake!
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Kukenas

customer_reviews.title: Arrives Fully Assembled!
customer_reviews.text: The Wine Jail is attractive. It has gold and black brush strokes instead of a solid shade. I was hoping I could fit my oddly shaped wine bottles in the hoops but I cannot. This is the only drawback I can find with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality. Exactly what I was looking for. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the quality for the price. Awesome piece.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one to see if I liked it and was good quality and 2 days after I received it I bought another. I have a feeling I’ll be buying another one shortly since I now have only 4 open spaces left.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wine rack!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a wine rack to use in the basement and when we opened the wine jail and set it up - we decided it was too beautiful to hide in the basement! Regular sized bottles fit with ease but it is not for the larger bottles. It is a bit smaller than it appeared online but is functional and a great addition to our home!

customer_reviews.title: Just received this and I love it. It securely holds the wine and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and I love it. It securely holds the wine and is decorative. Definitely would recommend as a gift idea.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, built well and came quick and complete. And this place had the best price!

customer_reviews.title: wine cellars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the cellars. Had a problem with one being bent during delivery but it was replaced within a few days at no cost to me. I would recommend these to anyone as a way to deter friends from opening bottles that are saved for later. Now to fill them (I bought 2)

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive

customer_reviews.title: Won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Awesome and adds lots of style to my kitchen!

product_meta.title: Wine Enthusiast Renaissance Wrought Iron Wine Jail
feature_bullets: HOLDS 45 BOTTLES - Proudly display your favorite varietals. Perfect for storing a whole collection, this large standing wine rack can store up to 45 standard Bordeaux bottles of wine.
LOCKABLE - Easily control access to your home cellar. Conveniently features a slide-lock latch door that allows you to keep your wines out of reach of adolescents. PADLOCK NOT INCLUDED.
BEAUTIFUL ACCENT PIECE - Guard your wine in grand style. Ornate metal scrollwork comes finished in an antique bronze that evokes the artistry of the Renaissance, a fitting setting for your wine bar.
WROUGHT IRON - As substantial as it is stylish, this sturdy wine stand is soldered with solid iron bars and arrives fully assembled.
DIMENSIONS - The wine storage measures 48.25"H x 16.25"W x 14.5"D.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars346 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Shipment will include two extra pieces of metal, they are only for shipping purposes, they can be discarded
